Common.errorOccurred: An error occurred. Please try again later.

appinfo.title: Thank you for visiting <bold>kallong</bold>!
appinfo.share: If you enjoyed the project, please share it with others.

notice.title: Notice
notice.anonymousEdit: • Lookbooks saved by non-logged-in users cannot be edited or searched. <bold>Please make sure to save the URL!</bold>
notice.anonymousDelete: • Data from non-logged-in users is periodically deleted, so please save the voting results in advance.
notice.feedback: • We welcome feedback and will reflect it as much as possible.

auth.passwordRequirements: At least 8 characters with 2 or more of: letters, numbers, special characters
auth.resetPasswordDescription: We'll send you a password reset link via email.
auth.resetPasswordSucceed: Password reset link has been sent to your email.
auth.resetPasswordFail: Failed to reset password. Please try again.
auth.updatePasswordDescription: Please enter a new password different from your previous one.
auth.deleteAccountDescription: If you delete your account, all information will be deleted. Are you sure you want to delete your account?

validation.passwordInvaildPattern: Include at least two of: English letters, numbers, special characters.
validation.nicknamInvalidPattern: Only English letters, Korean characters, and numbers are allowed.

error.session_expired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
error.over_email_send_rate_limit: Email send limit exceeded. Please try again later.
error.unknown_error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
error.termsRequired: Please agree to the terms and privacy policy.

Closet.emptyMessage: You haven’t written any records yet.

validation.nameMax: Please enter no more than 20 characters.
validation.descriptionMax: Please enter no more than 500 characters.

error.fileTooLarge: The file exceeds the {maxMb}MB limit and cannot be uploaded.
error.createFailed: An error occurred while creating the record.

main.invalidCharacters: Only English, Korean, numbers, spaces, hyphens(-), and underscores(_) are allowed.
